questInfo.Name: Flynn
questInfo.Aquaintance: I need some stuff to make more paint with, do you think you can get me some brightly coloured plants? The brighter the better!
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Thanks for this, I was running dangerously low on paint to keep considering myself and artist.

questInfo.Name: Peter
questInfo.Aquaintance: I haven't been out on a boat in years, I don't really have a reason to anymore...
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Incredible! Thank you! I don't know how I could ever repay you.

questInfo.Name: Poppy
questInfo.Aquaintance: I could've sworn I left my hat in my garden yesterday, could you be a dear and have a look round for it?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: You found it where? Thanks for finding it for me, although I could've sworn that I left it in my own garden!

questInfo.Name: Mirijam
questInfo.Aquaintance: My mother banned chocolate from the house, but she'll never know if you happen to bring me some...
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: You're amazing, now how am I going to get it into the house?

questInfo.Name: Jonas
questInfo.Aquaintance: Could you find my sister, she's not been studying AGAIN and she has exams coming up, I'll bet she's just off reading somewhere.
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Great you found her! I'm off to talk some sense into her then.

questInfo.Name: Maeve
questInfo.Aquaintance: Hey, glad you're here, my book is missing, I NEED to know how it ends, please help me find it!
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Oh thank goodness you found it, I was beginning to think I'd never find out what happened!

questInfo.Name: Serena
questInfo.Aquaintance: I cut Flynn's hair and I think I made it worse than it usually is, would it be possible for you to find me something I can give him to wear on his head untill it grows out again?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: This is perfect, he'll love it I'm sure, although I don't think he can tell his hair is different.

questInfo.Name: Walter
questInfo.Aquaintance: I need the nicest wood you can find, Mara just asked me could I make her a huge closet, she must have mounds of clothes lying around.
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: You have some do you? This is perfect thanks, I'm sure Mara will love it when I'm finished.

questInfo.Name: Mara
questInfo.Aquaintance: I know this is an awkward favour to ask, but could you possibly find out if Walter likes me? I've been wondering for a while but I could never work up the courage to ask.
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Did he say yes? He did! What am I going to say to him?! Thanks, I have to go think of something!

questInfo.Name: Tessa
questInfo.Aquaintance: I'm playing hide-and-seek with my girls at the moment, but they must be experts at this because I can't find them anywhere! can you help me?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: You found them! I'm glad, I was worried I was going to be all day searching for the little monsters!

questInfo.Name: Desmond
questInfo.Aquaintance: Could you deliver this parcel to Leo? I wanted to thank him for fixing my oven but I'm fairly busy at the moment. Thanks!
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Is it delivered? Thanks for helping me out, really appreciated.

questInfo.Name: Leo
questInfo.Aquaintance: I'm trying to fix this circuit, not sure what it does but I'm sure I'll find out eventually, I need some gold to do it though, would you get me some?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: Gold is an excellent conductor, I could use copper, but gold won't wear as easily, so win win!

questInfo.Name: Willow
questInfo.Aquaintance: I want to get something for my mom because it's her birthday eventually right? Could you find me something really special for her?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: I think my mom will love this, thanks for helping me find something.

questInfo.Name: Aspen
questInfo.Aquaintance: Are you going to the mine? I really need something shiny because I heard that some birds like shiny things and I really really like birds so, please?
questInfo.AquaintanceComplete: This looks shiny enough, I'm gonna leave it in the garden to see which bird likes it the most!
